title: The Art of Piano Playing - Heinrich Neuhaus
description: A classic text on piano technique emphasizing natural hand positions and relaxation to avoid tension-related injuries.

title: The Virtuoso Pianist in Sixty Exercises - Hanon
description: A collection of exercises designed to improve finger strength and independence while promoting ergonomic hand posture, also known as Hanon Exercises.

title: Biomechanics of Piano Technique
description: A technical overview of musculoskeletal coordination in pianists, including solutions for high wrist and excessive tension.

title: Postural Alignment for Efficient Piano Performance

description: Covers ergonomic adjustments to prevent forward-head posture and maintain visual alignment with the score and keyboard.

title: Motor Learning for Pianists
description: Examines neurological and motor-learning principles that support durable corrections of technical inefficiencies.
